{{Quote|House Hollard was strong once. House on the rise.|Dontos Hollard|Two Swords}}
'''House Hollard''' is an extinct vassal house of the [[Crownlands]], holding fealty to [[House Baratheon of King's Landing]]. The house was once powerful but over the years it fell into disgrace.
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, House Hollard was an ancient house sworn to House Darklyn, having three daughters wedded to Darklyn kings during the [[Age of Heroes]]. Following the Defiance of Duskendale, the entire House was executed at [[Mad King|Aerys II]]'s command, except for the infant Dontos Hollard who was allowed to live at Ser [[Barristan Selmy|Barristan Selmy's]] request.
sections.Known members:
